definition: set up on the principle of collectivism or ownership and production by the workers involved usually under the supervision of a government, members of a cooperative enterprise
details:
adjective
- set up on the principle of collectivism or ownership and production by the workers involved usually under the supervision of a government
= example: set up on the principle of collectivism or ownership and production by the workers involved usually under the supervision of a government
- forming a whole or aggregate
- done by or characteristic of individuals acting together
= synonyms: corporate
noun
- members of a cooperative enterprise
